creditFacade().details: Returns the Credit Facade connected to the adapter's Credit Manager

creditManager().details: Returns the Credit Manager connected to the adapter

curveLPtoken().details: Returns the address of a Curve pool LP token      staked in the adapter's targer Convex pool

extraReward1().details: Returns the address of the first extra reward token

extraReward2().details: Returns the address of the second extra reward token

stakedPhantomToken().details: Returns the address of a phantom token tracking      a Credit Account's staked balance in a Convex      pool

targetContract().details: Returns the address of the contract the adapter is interacting with

extraReward1().notice: address(0) if the Convex pool has no extra reward tokens

extraReward2().notice: address(0) if the Convex pool has less than 2 extra reward tokens

documentation.text:
@dev Thrown when the adapter attempts to use a token not
      allowed in its corresponding Credit Manager

@dev Returns the address of a Curve pool LP token
      staked in the adapter's targer Convex pool

@dev Returns the address of the first extra reward token
 @notice address(0) if the Convex pool has no extra reward tokens

@dev Returns the address of the second extra reward token
 @notice address(0) if the Convex pool has less than 2 extra reward tokens
